topic.title: Plan Of Care Activity Encounter - conformance rules

ol.li: Conforms to Plan Of Care Activity

SHALL satisfy: self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::INT or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::ARQ or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::PRMS or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::PRP or self.moodCode = vocab::x_DocumentEncounterMood::RQO
